me.elrod.pureio

Class PureFileIO<A>

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.elrod.pureio.PureFileIO<A>

  • public abstract class PureFileIO<A>
extends java.lang.Object
    A simple, untrampolined free IO monad for file operations: Free FileOperation.
